mapper.insert: insert into emp values( #{empId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phone}, default, null, default, #{jobCode}, #{deptCode} )
mapper.select: select e.*, (select job_title from job where job_code = e.job_code) job_title, (select base_day_off from job where job_code = e.job_code) base_day_off, (select dept_title from dept where dept_code = e.dept_code) dept_title from emp e
